page.title: 01Sampford Courtney and area
page.content: This block covers the remaining half of the village of Exbourne,the village of Sampford Courtney and the country side between. It is a rural area,predominantly pasture with a small area of moorland. The village of Sampford Courtney is virtually unchanged since it is a Conservation Area and new building strictly controlled. Sampford is a very pretty village, cottages are expensive and mainly owned by retired people.There is no school and the few children attend Exbourne or South Tawton schools. There are about 150 people actually living in the village and about 400 in the area.
